CODIF_DATA.HEADING: BI303

ML_TI_DOC.TI_TEXT: ЕИБ - Програма за техническа помощ за Механизъм за микрофинансиране и действия в подкрепа на финансовото приобщаване в Южното съседство на ЕС
EIB - Program technické pomoci pro mikrofinanční nástroj a pro opatření na podporu finančního začlenění v zemích v jižním sousedství EU
EIB - Teknisk bistandsprogram til mikrofinansieringsfaciliteten og tiltag til støtte af den finansielle inklusion i EU's sydlige naboskabslande
EIB - Programm für technische Hilfe für die Mikrofinanzfazilität und für Maßnahmen zur Förderung der finanziellen Inklusion in den Ländern der südlichen Nachbarschaft der EU
ΕΤΕπ - Πρόγραμμα τεχνικής βοήθειας για τον Μηχανισμό Μικροχρηματοδότησης και δράσεις για την ενίσχυση της χρηματοπιστωτικής ένταξης στις χώρες της Νότιας Γειτονίας της ΕΕ
EIB - Technical Assistance Programme to Microfinance Facility and actions supporting the financial inclusion in the Southern Neighbourhood of the EU
BEI - Programa de asistencia técnica para el mecanismo de microfinanciación y para las acciones en apoyo de la inclusión financiera en los países vecinos meridionales de la UE
EIP - Tehnilise abi programm mikrokrediidirahastu ja ELi lõunanaabruses finantsalast kaasamist toetavate meetmete jaoks
EIP - Mikrorahoitusjärjestelyä ja taloudellista osallisuutta tukevia toimia EU:n eteläisissä naapurimaissa koskeva teknisen tuen ohjelma
BEI - Programme d’assistance technique pour le Mécanisme de microfinance et pour des actions en faveur de l’inclusion financière dans les pays voisins du sud de l’UE
BEI - Technical Assistance Programme to Microfinance Facility and actions supporting the financial inclusion in the Southern Neighbourhood of the EU
EIB - Program tehničke pomoći instrumentu mikrofinanciranja i aktivnosti kojima se pruža podrška financijskoj uključenosti u južno susjedstvo EU-a
EBB - Mikrofinanszírozási eszközhöz és az EU déli szomszédsága pénzügyi kirekesztésének felszámolását támogató műveletekhez biztosított szakmai segítségnyújtási program
BEI - Programma di assisstenza tecnica allo strumento di microfinanza e alle azioni a sostegno dell’inclusione finanziaria nel vicinato meridionale dell’UE
EIB - Techninės pagalbos programa mikrofinansų priemonei ir veiksmams, kuriais remiama finansinė įtrauktis ES pietinėse kaimyninėse šalyse
EIB - Tehniskās palīdzības programma mikrofinansēšanas instrumentam un darbībām, ar ko atbalsta finansiālo integrāciju ES dienvidu kaimiņreģionā
BEI - Programm ta’ Għajnuna Teknika lill-Faċilità tal-Mikrofinanza u azzjonijiet li jappoġġjaw l-inklużjoni finanzjarja fil-Madwar tan-Nofsinhar tal-UE
EIB - Technischebijstandsprogramma ten behoeve van de microfinancieringsfaciliteit en -acties die de financiële inclusie in de zuidelijke buurlanden van de EU ondersteunen
EBI - Program pomocy technicznej na rzecz instrumentu mikrofinansowego i działania wspierające włączenie finansowe w krajach południowego sąsiedztwa UE
BEI - Programa de Assistência Técnica para o Instrumento de Microfinanciamento e ações de apoio à inclusão financeira nos países vizinhos do Sul da UE
BEI - Program de asistență tehnică pentru Instrumentul de microfinanțare și acțiuni de susținere a incluziunii financiare în vecinătatea sudică a UE
EIB - Program technickej pomoci pre nástroj mikrofinancovania a opatrenia na podporu finančného začlenenia v južnom susedstve EÚ
EIB - Program tehnične pomoči za mikrofinančni instrument in ukrepi, namenjeni podpori finančne vključenosti v južnem sosedstvu EU
EIB - Program för tekniskt bistånd avseende instrumentet för mikrokrediter och åtgärder till stöd för finansiell inkludering i EU:s södra grannskap

TI_DOC.P: EIB - Technical Assistance Programme to Microfinance Facility and actions supporting the financial inclusion in the Southern Neighbourhood of the EU (LU-Luxembourg)

TXT_MARK.P: TA2016068 R0 NIF
Restricted international tender
General budget of the union through the Neighbourhood investment facility (NIF)
Fee-based

In the framework of the risk capital facility for the Southern Neighbourhood countries, financed by the EIB and the European Commission (from the general budget of the European Union under the Neighbourhood Investment Facility), the bank launched the Southern Neighbourhood Microfinance Facility ("SNMF or the facility"), to realise small microfinance investments in the Southern Neighbourhood of the European Union (the "Region").

The overall objective of this TA operation is to promote responsible financial inclusion of the Southern Mediterranean populations to reduce poverty, encourage entrepreneurship and increase stability across the region. The aim is to improve the quantity and quality of financial services and non-financial services available to final beneficiaries/clients currently unserved or underserved by the traditional financial sector.
The specific objectives of this technical assistance operation are:
(i) Component 1: To support the implementation of the SNMF by facilitating its deployment in an efficient, responsible and sustainable manner;
(ii) Component 2: To provide Financial Intermediaries with tailor made capacity building in a variety of areas via consulting and/or coaching interventions;

(iii) Component 3: To organise support actions and provide training aimed at improving the level of financial literacy, improving managerial capacity and building entrepreneurshipskills of current and potential final beneficiaries, in cooperation with financial intermediaries.

A team of long-term, intermittent and short-term experts specialized in microfinance, risk management, financial and social performance and business development with experience in similar kinds of assignments shall implement the aforementioned components.

The contractor will also be requested (i) to oversee the whole programme as well as coordinate and supervise the provision of the above TA components to the various FIs and (ii) provide a first level control of the allocations under the underlying facilities.
The project will be headed up from the region (location to be determined), for a period of 3 years.

In parallel to this tender, the EIB will also be launching a TA programme entitled “Technical assistance programme to microfinance facility and actions supporting the financial inclusion of more vulnerable persons in the Southern Neighbourhood of the EU”. Cooperation between the 2 TA programmes is expected.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Intended timing of publication of the procurement notice

TXT_MARK.P: March 2018
None

General budget of the union through the Neighbourhood investment facility (NIF)
Fee-based

In the framework of the risk capital facility for the Southern Neighbourhood countries, financed by the EIB and the European Commission (from the general budget of the European Union under the Neighbourhood Investment Facility), the bank launched the Southern Neighbourhood Microfinance Facility ("SNMF or the facility"), to realise small microfinance investments in the Southern Neighbourhood of the European Union (the "Region").

The overall objective of this TA operation is to promote responsible financial inclusion of the Southern Mediterranean populations to reduce poverty, encourage entrepreneurship and increase stability across the region. The aim is to improve the quantity and quality of financial services and non-financial services available to final beneficiaries/clients currently unserved or underserved by the traditional financial sector.
The specific objectives of this technical assistance operation are:
(i) Component 1: To support the implementation of the SNMF by facilitating its deployment in an efficient, responsible and sustainable manner;
(ii) Component 2: To provide Financial Intermediaries with tailor made capacity building in a variety of areas via consulting and/or coaching interventions;

(iii) Component 3: To organise support actions and provide training aimed at improving the level of financial literacy, improving managerial capacity and building entrepreneurshipskills of current and potential final beneficiaries, in cooperation with financial intermediaries.

A team of long-term, intermittent and short-term experts specialized in microfinance, risk management, financial and social performance and business development with experience in similar kinds of assignments shall implement the aforementioned components.

The contractor will also be requested (i) to oversee the whole programme as well as coordinate and supervise the provision of the above TA components to the various FIs and (ii) provide a first level control of the allocations under the underlying facilities.
The project will be headed up from the region (location to be determined), for a period of 3 years.

In parallel to this tender, the EIB will also be launching a TA programme entitled “Technical assistance programme to microfinance facility and actions supporting the financial inclusion of more vulnerable persons in the Southern Neighbourhood of the EU”. Cooperation between the 2 TA programmes is expected.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Intended timing of publication of the procurement notice

TXT_MARK.P: March 2018
None
